sources.name: dimperson_sql
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~>  dimperson_sql

sources.name: dimcity_sql
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~>  dimcity_sql

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared dimperson_sql = let AdfDoc = Sql.Database("n-dimensions.database.windows.net", "ClassroomDB", [CreateNavigationProperties = false]), InputTable = AdfDoc{[Schema="dbo",Item="dimPerson"]}[Data] in InputTable;
shared dimcity_sql = let AdfDoc = Sql.Database("n-dimensions.database.windows.net", "ClassroomDB", [CreateNavigationProperties = false]), InputTable = AdfDoc{[Schema="dbo",Item="dimCity"]}[Data] in InputTable;
shared PersonCity = let 
    person0 = dimperson_sql, 
    city0 = dimcity_sql, 
    personCity0 = 
        Table.Join (
            person0, 
            "CityId", 
            city0, 
            "Id" )
in 
    personCity0;
